PrecisApproval of the appointment by the Minister of Natural Resources of HUGH MacDIARMID of Hinsdale, Illinois, United States of America, as President and Chief Executive Officer of Atomic Energy of Canada Limited to hold office during pleasure for a term of three years, effective January 2, 2008.
